artist: Natori Shunsen; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica and embossing
text: Ninth design of a set of 36. Based on Ichikawa Sadanji II as the holy priest Narukami in the scene Iwaya kitō of the play Narukami 鳴神　岩屋祈祷, performed at the Imperial Theater, December 1919.
title: The Actor Ichikawa Sadanji II as Narukami
